data.title: Florida State University Athletics
data.meta_description: Jaime Ferrer (7) Outfielder - ACCOLADES: 2023: All-ACC Academic Team, ACC Academic Honor Roll, Dean’s List (Fall 2022 & Spring 2023), CSC Academic All-Distri...
data.text:
SOPHOMORE (2023):

Started all 54 games, hitting .324 with 39 runs and 42 RBI…led FSU with 73 hits and 22 doubles…added two triples and seven home runs, with 10 walks and was hit by six pitches…has started all 113 games in career…had a 20-game hitting streak between March and April, tied for the 17th-longest in school history and the longest since 2011…hit .405 during his streak…four hitting streaks in career of at least 10 games…at No. 8 TCU (2/24-25), combined for six hits, six RBI, six runs, two doubles, a triple and two home runs…first multi-HR game of career and FSU’s first of season…tied his career high with four hits vs. Pitt (3/12), including a home run and two doubles…hit back-to-back home runs against the Panthers with James Tibbs, FSU’s only back-to-back jacks on the year…outfield assist on Opening Day vs. James Madison (2/17)…played summer ball in the Cape Cod League with the Brewster Whitecaps, hitting .313 with five doubles and three home runs over 31 games.

FRESHMAN (2022):

Led Florida State with a .320 batting average, 40 runs scored, 70 hits, 19 doubles and 118 total bases…was hit by a pitch 23 times, most in the ACC and one shy of the FSU single-season record…led FSU with a .436 on-base percentage…most hits and doubles for an FSU freshman since DJ Stewart in 2013…bookended his freshman season with 10-game hitting streaks and started all 59 games…first Seminole since Taylor Walls in 2015 to start every game his freshman season…ended his freshman campaign with nine home runs, including one against UCLA in the NCAA Regional…hit a walk-off solo home run in the 17th inning to beat NC State 6-5, the second-longest game in FSU history…hit three doubles in a game against Wake Forest…had a pair of four-hit games, against NC State and Wake Forest…had two four-RBI games, against Louisville and NC State…scored three runs twice, vs. NC State and at North Carolina…was hit by a pitch twice in four different games.

PERSONAL:Graduated from Florida Virtual School and played baseball for Central Point Academy in Kissimmee…No. 323 on the Perfect Game national rankings and No. 47 in the state of Florida…diagnosed with Type 1 diabetes at age 3…grew up playing tennis…parents are Jimmy and Mila Ferrer…brothers Gabriel and Diego…dad played professional basketball and grandfather played baseball and basketball for the Cuban national team…majoring in sport management…born on December 27, 2002.
